name: Ysil
appearance: Peat-smudged face, a net of bog beads, reed tattoos that braid down the throat.
character: Sardonic and proud; trusts mud and reeds more than stone and bells.
talents: hears lies ripple across still fen water
coaxes moor-lights to mark a safe path
dreams: rekindle a legal kiln in the Obsidian Fen
gaze into the witch-mirror without owing the Veil
teach cityfolk to walk bog without sinking
secrets: owes a night to the Veil after gazing at blackwater
harvested a mirrorglass lily that whispers her own lies
helped move a kiln core under the Wardens' noses
